alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa; Johnson; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 1:56PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Johnson, southeastern Benton, southwestern Linn and eastern Iowa Counties through 230 PM CST... At 156 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Williamsburg, or near Marengo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Conroy around 200 PM CST. Marengo around 205 PM CST. Amana around 215 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Norway and Walford. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 215 and 228. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
